answers.answer: I have my test next week and he said I could eat pretty much anything before I drink it but after I drink the glucose stuff not to have anything but water.I would just stick with a light breakfast.I hope your test comes out clear

question: Hey ladies! I go this morning for my gest. diabetes test :(  Ugh!!  Anyway, anyone have any ideas on what is "safe" to eat before testing? Im scared if I dont eat, Ill get sick :0   Im soooo dreading drinking that c r a p!  From what I can remember , it made me lightheaded and sleepy when I took it with my last pregnancy. Did it affect anyone else in a bad way? Thanks for any help!
title: Question about GD test...
